name: Disaster Island (itch)
description:
Can you build a civilization on an island that's constantly hit by natural disasters?

Grow your population by building new houses, and evaculate your people when natural disasters are about to strike! Keep your population alive!

Controls:

WASD - Move Camera

Scroll - Zoom Camera

Click on house - Move People

Click on empty plot (when moving people) - Build New House

Click on existing house (when moving people) - Relocate People

Made for Ludum Dare 46, with the theme 'Keep it alive.'

Known bugs:

* Sometimes camera glitches through ground: just scroll backwards to get back.

* Sometimes people get stuck in the middle of nowhere, send other people to their square to help them getting unstuck.
